About

This page is under development! Check back for updates.

danswick

I’m Dan. I live in Chicago, ride bikes, make things from fabric and put things on maps. I work for the Delta Institute with a great team of environmental entrepreneurs, looking for those rare opportunities to turn a good idea, solid partnerships and a willingness to go out on a limb into environmental, economic and social impact. I work with data (especially of the geographic variety), occasionally contributing a good idea and tracking down means to try it out.

This space is part experiment, documentation, memory aid, and sounding board.

Tech Specs

Because whether it’s computers, bicycles, craft beer or home appliances, everybody loves specs.

  • Built with Jekyll, because static pages are great
  • Theme is Poole with a few minor style modifications
  • Hosting is by Github Pages
